thread.title: Comfortable hotel -- convenient location
thread.title_full: Comfortable hotel -- convenient location - Review of Holiday Inn Paris Opera-Grands Boulevards, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: marco_polo_1450
title: Comfortable hotel -- convenient location
text: Conveniently located next to a metro station; close to a bus stop; a short walk from Place de l'Opera and Galeries Lafayette. Very helpful staff upgraded me to a large comfortable & clean room overlooking the street. This hotel is close to reasonably priced cafes. Around the corner on rue de Montmartre is le Bouillan-Chartier -- a terrific restaurant well worth a visit for lunch or dinner.
